title: Checking in on the Chickens in their New Coop

subtasks: Spreading hay for bedding and feeding
Allowing chickens to scratch and eat the hay
Managing access to nest boxes during the day
Collecting eggs and securing the coop at night
Monitoring and adjusting carbon levels (through hay addition)
Observing ducks' water usage and cleanliness
Ensuring adequate water supply for ducks
Calculation of feed and butcher costs

tasks.task: Engaging with viewers and promoting social media
subtasks: Promoting the Instagram and Facebook pages
